sense.gloss: play (in a mechanism, e.g. a steering wheel)
flexibility (in a performance, art, etc.), freedom
to play (games, sports), to enjoy oneself, to have a good time
to mess about (with alcohol, gambling, philandery, etc.)
to be idle, to do nothing, to be unused
to meet up (with friends), to hang out
to give oneself up (to gambling, drinking, etc.)
to go to (for pleasure or for study)
to intentionally throw a ball to lower the batter's concentration
play and dance (at a kindergarten or elementary school)
westward trip, trip to the West
playing in the water (sea, lake, river, etc.), playing with water
doing something dangerous, playing with fire
playing around (with someone), flirting, having an affair
to grow wild, to run to waste, to become degenerate
to become rough (of art, craft, etc.), to lose refinement, to deteriorate (of skill)
to intensify (of wind, rain, etc.), to become more severe
to grow wild, to run to waste, to become degenerate
to become rough (of art, craft, etc.), to lose refinement, to deteriorate (of skill)
to intensify (of wind, rain, etc.), to become more severe
to do as one pleases, to amuse oneself, to play around
amusement, diversion (to pass time), pastime, recreation
person without a steady job, idler, freeloader
to hum (a tune), to sing to oneself, to croon
living a life of leisure with dignity, living quietly and comfortably free from worldly cares, otium cum dignitate
extravagant spree, wild merrymaking, living it up

sdata.j: ねぇ↑遊↑↓あそ↓んでよ、とっても↑退屈↑↓たいくつ↓なの！
sdata.e: Come on, play with me, I'm so bored!

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑都合↑↓つごう↓のよいときに↑遊↑↓あそ↓びにいらっしゃい。
sdata.e: Come and see me when it is convenient for you.

sdata.j: ↑近頃↑↓ちかごろ↓、↑子供↑↓こども↓は↑外↑↓ほか↓に↑遊↑↓あそ↓びに↑出↑↓で↓ない。
sdata.e: Nowadays children do not play outdoors.

sdata.j: ↑去年↑↓きょねん↓↑建↑↓た↓てられた↑遊園↑↓ゆうえん↓↑地↑↓ち↓のおかげで、その↑町↑↓まち↓は↑人気↑↓にんき↓を↑呼↑↓よ↓ぶようになった。
sdata.e: Thanks to the amusement park built last year, the city has become popular.

sdata.j: ↑去年↑↓きょねん↓みたいに↑遊↑↓あそ↓びに↑行↑↓い↓きましょう。
sdata.e: We could go out together like we did last year.

sdata.j: ↑猫↑↓ねこ↓がいなくなるとネズミたちが↑遊↑↓あそ↓びだす。
sdata.e: When the cat is away, the mice will play.

sdata.j: ↑機械↑↓きかい↓は↑今↑↓いま↓↑遊↑↓あそ↓んでいる。
sdata.e: The machines are idle now.

sdata.j: ↑楽↑↓たの↓しく↑遊↑↓あそ↓んできなさい。でも↑道↑↓みち↓に↑迷↑↓まよ↓わないように。
sdata.e: Have fun, but don't get lost.

sdata.j: ↑外↑↓そと↓に↑遊↑↓あそ↓びに↑行↑↓い↓ってもいいですか。
sdata.e: May I go out to play?

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑外↑↓そと↓で↑遊↑↓あそ↓んでいます。
sdata.e: He is playing outdoors.

sdata.j: ↑海辺↑↓うみべ↓は↑子供↑↓こども↓たちが↑遊↑↓あそ↓ぶのに↑理想↑↓りそう↓↑的↑↓てき↓な↑場所↑↓ばしょ↓だ。
sdata.e: The seaside is an ideal spot for the children to play.

sdata.j: ↑我々↑↓われわれ↓はトランプ↑遊↑↓あそ↓びで↑時間↑↓じかん↓をつぶした。
sdata.e: We killed time by playing cards.

sdata.j: ↑我々↑↓われわれ↓はその↑子供↑↓こども↓が↑遊↑↓あそ↓んでいるのを↑見↑↓み↓ていた。
sdata.e: We were watching the child at play.

sdata.j: ↑火↑↓ひ↓の↑近↑↓ちか↓くで↑遊↑↓あそ↓ぶのは↑危険↑↓きけん↓だ。
sdata.e: It's dangerous to play around the fire.

sdata.j: ↑暇↑↓ひま↓なら↑遊↑↓あそ↓びにおいでよ。
sdata.e: If you are free, come around to see me.

sdata.j: ↑暇↑↓ひま↓なときはいつでも↑遊↑↓あそ↓びに↑来↑↓き↓て↑下↑↓くだ↓さい。
sdata.e: Come and see me whenever you are free.

sdata.j: ↑夏↑↓なつ↓になると↑彼↑↓かれ↓らは１↑日↑↓にち↓↑中↑↓ちゅう↓、↑浜辺↑↓はまべ↓で↑遊↑↓あそ↓んだものだった。
sdata.e: In summer, they used to play on the beach all day long.

sdata.j: ↑何↑↓なに↓↑百↑↓ひゃく↓↑人↑↓にん↓もの↑少年↑↓しょうねん↓↑達↑↓たち↓がグラウンドで↑遊↑↓あそ↓んでいる。
sdata.e: Hundreds of boys are playing in the ground.

sdata.j: ↑何↑↓なに↓をして↑遊↑↓あそ↓ぼうか。
sdata.e: What shall we play?

sdata.j: ↑何↑↓なに↓かして↑遊↑↓あそ↓ぼうよ。
sdata.e: Let's play something.

sdata.j: ↑雨降↑↓あめふ↓りなので、↑外↑↓そと↓で↑遊↑↓あそ↓べません。
sdata.e: It's a rainy day, so we can't play outside.

sdata.j: ↑雨↑↓あめ↓がひどく↑降↑↓ふ↓ってきた、それで↑私↑↓わたし↓たちは↑屋内↑↓おくない↓で↑遊↑↓あそ↓んだ。
sdata.e: It was raining hard, so we played indoors.

sdata.j: ↑一般↑↓いっぱん↓↑的↑↓てき↓に↑言↑↓い↓って、↑子供↑↓こども↓は↑戸外↑↓こがい↓で↑遊↑↓あそ↓ぶのが↑好↑↓す↓きだ。
sdata.e: Generally speaking, children like to play outdoors.

sdata.j: ↑一↑↓いち↓↑日↑↓にち↓↑中↑↓ちゅう↓↑海岸↑↓かいがん↓で↑遊↑↓あそ↓んだ。
sdata.e: We enjoyed ourselves at the seaside all day.

sdata.j: ↑一緒↑↓いっしょ↓に↑遊↑↓あそ↓ばない？
sdata.e: Would you play with me?

sdata.j: ↑一緒↑↓いっしょ↓に↑遊↑↓あそ↓びませんか。
sdata.e: Would you play with me?

sdata.j: ↑以前↑↓いぜん↓はよく↑妹↑↓いもうと↓とその↑公園↑↓こうえん↓で↑遊↑↓あそ↓んだものだ。
sdata.e: I used to play with my sister in the park.

sdata.j: ↑暗↑↓くら↓すぎて↑外↑↓そと↓では↑遊↑↓あそ↓べないよ。
sdata.e: It is too dark to play outside.

sdata.j: ↑暗↑↓くら↓すぎて、↑外↑↓そと↓では↑遊↑↓あそ↓べない。
sdata.e: It's too dark to play outside.

sdata.j: ルーシーが↑三↑↓さん↓↑日↑↓にち↓↑前↑↓まえ↓に↑私↑↓わたし↓のところに↑遊↑↓あそ↓びに↑来↑↓き↓ました。
sdata.e: Lucy came to see me three days ago.
